name: AgED
short_description:
AgED performs automatic feature extraction from your image data and allows for their visualization and management.

AgED relies on Elliptic Fourier Transcriptors to extract features from large quantities of image data. These features can then be visualized and you can evaluate them in a statistical manner.

This type of analysis is particularly worthwile in the assessment of biological experiments. Elliptic Fourier Descriptors have been applied in a large range of applications in biology. Examples include the distinguishing of leaf shapes, fish sex, organ size and so forth.

AgED is intended for scientific use only. Use and distribution of this technology is subject to the Java Research License included herein. AgED comes with absolutely no warranty.

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Science/Research
